notes.text:
This update for python-pyxdg fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-12761: Fixed a code injection issue in Category elements of
  a Menu XML (bsc#1137627).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A code injection issue was discovered in PyXDG before 0.26 via crafted Python code in a Category element of a Menu XML document in a .menu file. XDG_CONFIG_DIRS must be set up to trigger xdg.Menu.parse parsing within the directory containing this file. This is due to a lack of sanitization in xdg/Menu.py before an eval call.
notes.title: CVE description
